name: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: A classic Italian pasta dish made with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and pepper.
recipeInstructions: Boil water for pasta.
Fry pancetta until crisp.
Beat eggs with cheese and pepper.
Cook pasta until al dente.
Mix hot pasta with egg mixture and pancetta quickly to create a creamy sauce.

name: Vegetable Stir Fry
description: A quick and healthy vegetarian stir fry with soy sauce.
recipeInstructions: Heat oil in a wok.
Stir fry ginger and garlic.
Add vegetables and cook for 5-7 minutes.
Add soy sauce and toss well.
Serve with rice.

name: Grilled Chicken Salad
description: A light and refreshing salad with grilled chicken breast.
recipeInstructions: Grill chicken breasts until cooked through.
Slice chicken.
Toss salad greens, cucumber, and tomatoes.
Top with chicken.
Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice.

name: Beef Tacos
description: Classic Mexican-style beef tacos with fresh toppings.
recipeInstructions: Brown ground beef in a pan.
Add taco seasoning and water as per packet instructions.
Simmer until thickened.
Warm taco shells.
Assemble tacos with beef and toppings.

name: Lentil Soup
description: Hearty and nutritious vegan lentil soup.
recipeInstructions: Sauté onion, carrots, and celery.
Add lentils, broth, and spices.
Simmer for 30-40 minutes until lentils are soft.
Blend half the soup for creaminess if desired.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
description: Creamy and spicy Indian chicken curry.
recipeInstructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and paste for 1 hour.
Grill or fry chicken until charred.
Simmer tomato puree and cream.
Add chicken to sauce and simmer for 10 minutes.
Garnish with cilantro.

name: Mushroom Risotto
description: Creamy Italian rice dish with mixed mushrooms.
recipeInstructions: Sauté mushrooms and set aside.
Sauté onion, then add rice and toast slightly.
Add wine and let evaporate.
Gradually add stock, stirring constantly.
Stir in mushrooms, butter, and parmesan at the end.

name: Baked Salmon with Asparagus
description: Simple sheet pan dinner with healthy fats.
recipeInstructions: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
Place salmon and asparagus on a baking sheet.
Drizzle with oil and season.
Top with lemon slices and dill.
Bake for 12-15 minutes.

name: Oatmeal with Berries
description: Warm breakfast oats with fresh antioxidant-rich berries.
recipeInstructions: Combine oats and milk in a pot.
Cook over medium heat until thickened.
Stir in maple syrup.
Top with fresh berries and chia seeds.

name: Classic Beef Burger
description: Juicy homemade beef burger with fries.
recipeInstructions: Form beef into patties.
Fry or grill patties to desired doneness.
Fry potatoes until golden.
Assemble burgers with buns and toppings.
